attributes.action: james a cargill & the people of gosport &surounding areas stop the closure of hasler hospital
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: we the people of gosport and surounding area wish the p.m intervene in the planned closure of this hospital.portsmouth round trip would take 4 hrs by public transport or 25 mins in a car.

rejection.details: Unfortunatley your title is still not clear. We suggest you shorten your title to "stop the closure of hasler hospital" i.e. remove "james a cargill & the people of gosport &surounding areas". You may place this detail in the body of your petition.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
